text: Darfield United F.C. was an English association football club based in Darfield, Barnsley, South Yorkshire. ==History== The club was formed early in the 20th century, and remained in existence for just over a decade, during which time they won the Barnsley Association League and entered the FA Cup.Sheffield Daily Telegraph, 19 July 1909, page 11Sheffield Sheffield Daily Telegraph, 2 June 1905, page 12 ==Honours== *Barnsley Association League **Champions - 1912/13 ==Records== *Best FA Cup performance: 3rd Qualifying Round, 1912–13 ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in South Yorkshire Category:Sheffield Association League Category:Barnsley Association League
title: Darfield United F.C.
